motions.title: Move Treetop Quest Item to Business Items
motions.description: Motion to move item 6 (Treetop Quest Dunwoody Renewal) from Consent Agenda to Business Items.

motions.title: Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Adoption
motions.description: Adoption of the proposed Fiscal Year 2025 budget after public hearing.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval as Amended
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda as amended including: • October 15, 2024 meeting minutes • Contract amendment with Triscapes for road and stormwater maintenance

motions.title: Table Treetop Quest Renewal Agreement
motions.description: Motion to table the Treetop Quest Dunwoody renewal agreement until the November 12, 2024 meeting due to recent safety incident.

publicHearings.title: Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Adoption
publicHearings.description: Public hearing for adoption of FY2025 budget. No public comments for or against.

presentations.title: Third Quarter Economic Development Update
presentations.description: Activity update, project updates, and brand message development. New brand message: 'cosmopolitan vibes/small town feels'. Hotel market analysis showing 2100 rooms, 70% occupancy, $99 revenue per available room.

presentations.title: Dunwoody Senior Baseball Annual Report
presentations.description: Annual report showing service to over 2,000 players, 22 employees, 5 field managers. Discussed challenges with field time and need for netting along Barclay.

discussionItems.title: On-Call Contract for Materials Testing Services
discussionItems.description: Recommendation for unit price contracts with Nova Engineering, Geo-Hydro Engineering, and United Consulting for engineering and testing services.

discussionItems.title: Georgetown Gateway Public Art Project
discussionItems.description: Proposal for 'Human Interfusion' sculpture installation on Chamblee Dunwoody Road, cost $55,000 from 1% public art set-aside.

discussionItems.title: Memorandum of Agreement with Flock Group
discussionItems.description: Agreement allowing police vehicle laptops to communicate with Real Time Crime Center.

discussionItems.title: Stage Door Players Legal Entity Change
discussionItems.description: Proposal to change legal name from Stage Door Players to Stage Door Theatre.

discussionItems.title: Brook Run Skate Park Mural Surplus
discussionItems.description: Request to surplus 50 large-scale murals and authorize staff to negotiate with artists for reacquisition.

discussionItems.title: Veterans Memorial Design
discussionItems.description: Update on proposed design with overwhelming veteran support and discussion of bringing back bricks program.
